channel.title: Axocontrol multiple pages
channel.description: I'm pretty sure that there is already a solution on the forum but i can't find it i have axo+axocontrol and i want to make 'pages', with the press of a button i can change the page in every page the six knobs act on different parameters (for examples, page1 lfo, page2 filters ecc) Now i have this patch, when the first led is lid, i can control the pitch of the first oscillator but when the second led is lid... the pitch of the second oscillator doesn't change. pages.axp (5.5 KB)

item.title: Axocontrol multiple pages
item.dc:creator: @urbanspaceman francesco
item.description:
@urbanspaceman wrote:

I'm pretty sure that there is already a solution on the forum but i can't find it
i have axo+axocontrol and i want to make 'pages', with the press of a button i can change the page
in every page the six knobs act on different parameters (for examples, page1 lfo, page2 filters ecc)

Now i have this patch, when the first led is lid, i can control the pitch of the first oscillator but when the second led is lid... the pitch of the second oscillator doesn't change.

pages.axp (5.5 KB)

Schermata 2017-09-12 alle 19.36.32.png1527x782 69.7 KB

Read full topic
